post.text: Más de 200 milllones de personas ya se han registrado y el número continúa aumentando. Haz tu plan para votar aquí: hillaryclinton.com/planparavotar

comment.author: Mikaela
comment.text: Trump even criticizes his allies regarding the armee whereas they are now fighting together against our ennemies. He should cooperate with his allies instead of supporting Puttins policy.
